Blog.post: Hey!! wow its almost august can you believe this??!! soooo..when school starts again i have to go on a mojor shopping spree and i have to colour my hair. so heres the thing. should i colour it light the way it is now or back to my natural colour????????? help me! i dunno. alright thats about it..ppl we have to go shoppin soon =D

Well well well...its been a few days since my last entry..tryin to get used to this thing ...Gloria--> this ones 4 your comment.. =D/ soooo...i dont really know what to say but hows everyones summer goin? great i hope. I cant believe its already the end of July but theres still a long way to go. yup..ppl i need some ideas on things to talk about on here. i went shopping a few days ago spent the whole day at the mall. very exhausting. k so thats about it. this entry was pretty pointless. later =D
Hey!! Howz it goin?? I just got my blog so this is my 1st entry =D.. im gonna see how this works out
speed omg that is such a good movie with keanu reeves. gloria i just read your blog about it. Luv that movie =D

Hello =D omg school is starting soon...this summer went by kinda quickly and i have soooooo much shopping to do. I dont think im gonna colour my hair. im prob just gonna leave it the way it is 4 now =D yup omg 4 love or money is on now the season finale so thats about it everyone enjoy the rest of your sumer =D Have Fun!!!

omg i went to see the village yesterday and it sucked. The previews looked soooo good so everyone thought it would be a really good and scary movie but no. Yesterday was fun though but if you wanna see a really good movie dont see the village =D

Hey ..omg i was outside 4 like 7 hrs today..well technically yesterday cuz its past midnight now but i got burned :(. My face, everywhere and i mean EVERYWHERE on my arms and on my legs too. omg so much pain. But today was awesome =D k thats it later
